nodes.text: KOTOR Campaign Guide Web Enhancement 4: Heirloom Items

KOTOR Campaign Guide Web Enhancement 4: Heirloom Items is an online supplement for Star Wars Roleplaying Game, written by John Jackson Miller. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on October 1, 2008 and is fourth in the series of web enhancements, which present material that didn't made it into Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide because of space reasons. This article covers the crafting of personal "heirloom" items such as Freedon Nadd's short lightsaber and Carth Onasi's blaster.
